title: Contributing
text: working locally use following workflow help develop code: Open R session Load devtools Make change package files Test R session running load_all() load package (check errors) Check changes pass tests running test()

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Welcome nutrientprofiler R package repository! package provides functions help assess product information UK Nutrient Profiling Model (2004/5) scope HFSS legislation around product placement. designed provide low level functions implement UK Nutrient Profiling Model scoring can applied across product datasets. project working--progress breaking changes may introduced without notice üë∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
